title: Candy Box Creations
description:
A collection of 5 dark yet heartwarming stories by Yasuo Ohtagaki.

Tree: A woman gets stranded on a barren planet with a dwindling oxygen supply.

Museum of Another World: A boy enters a strange museum where everything feels slightly off.

Mama Mia: A woman reluctantly fulfills a promise to her mother.

An Autograph Signing: A man from the past appears in the modern day claiming he was abducted by aliens.

Scorpion: An experimental tank, codenamed Scorpion, is loose in a nature reserve. A crack commando team is dispatched to stop Scorpion before it causes more damage.
author: Yasuo Ohtagaki
